name: Hollow Kid
description:
Game made for Weekly Game Jam 74 "Hack & Slash". In development.


Controls:
Move: AWSD
Run: Left Shift
Punch: Left Click Mouse
Kick: Right Click Mouse
Quit: Escape


Tips:
-For a better contact, aim to the enemy´s foots.
-For a better experience, play the game on FullScreen.
-If you play the game on the browser, the music could take a few seconds to start when you run it for the first time.
